name: zlmbas
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

body.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c2))
-| wceq(cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, c1))
body.pretty:
⊢ c0 =(Base ` c1)
⊣ c0 =(Base ` c2)
⊣ (Base ` c2)=(Base ` c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c2))
-| wceq(cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, c1))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 =(Base ` c1)
⊣ c0 =(Base ` c2)
⊣ (Base ` c2)=(Base ` c1)

body.origin:
|- wceq(cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, c1))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(czlm, c2))
-| wceq(cbs, cslot(nat1))
-| wcel(nat1, cn)
-| wbr(nat1, clt, nat5)
body.pretty:
⊢ (Base ` c2)=(Base ` c1)
⊣ c1 =(ZMod ` c2)
⊣ Base = Slot(1)
⊣ 1 ∈ ℕ
⊣ 1[<]5

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(czlm, c2))
-| wceq(cbs, cslot(nat1))
-| wcel(nat1, cn)
-| wbr(nat1, clt, nat5)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 =(Base ` c1)
⊣ c0 =(Base ` c2)
⊣ c1 =(ZMod ` c2)
⊣ Base = Slot(1)
⊣ 1 ∈ ℕ
⊣ 1[<]5

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(czlm, c2))
-| wcel(nat1, cn)
-| wbr(nat1, clt, nat5)

|- wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(czlm, c2))
-| wbr(nat1, clt, nat5)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 =(Base ` c1)
⊣ c0 =(Base ` c2)
⊣ c1 =(ZMod ` c2)
⊣ 1[<]5

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(czlm, c2))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 =(Base ` c1)
⊣ c0 =(Base ` c2)
⊣ c1 =(ZMod ` c2)

comment: Base set of a ` ZZ ` -module. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Oct-2015.)
